model

Class SystemSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.SystemSettings

  • public class SystemSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a SystemSetting object which stores the settings that can contribute to the ticket price.
    Since:
    2017-11-06
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Amos

    • Constructor Detail

      • SystemSettings

        private SystemSettings()
        Creates a SystemSettings object. It will attempt to read from the database. If there is no settings found in database, it will load the default settings.

    • Method Detail

      • addHoliday

        public boolean addHoliday(java.util.Calendar holiday)
        Add a holiday. It will also check if it the holiday date is already added in to the system.
        Parameters:
        holiday - Holiday date.
        Returns:
        true if successfully added. false otherwise.

      • readSettings

        public void readSettings(java.lang.String fileName)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Read the settings to file. It follows the order: Base price, platinum surcharge, senior discount, children discount, weekend/holiday surcharge, gold class surchage, list of holidays.
        Parameters:
        fileName - File name to read the settings.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - File not found.

      • setBasePrice

        public void setBasePrice(double basePrice)
        Set the base price of the movie ticket.
        Parameters:
        basePrice - Base price of the movie ticket.

      • setChildDiscount

        public void setChildDiscount(double childDiscount)
        Set the discount for children.
        Parameters:
        childDiscount - New discount for children.

      • setGoldExtra

        public void setGoldExtra(double goldExtra)
        Set the gold class surcharge.
        Parameters:
        goldExtra - New surcharge for gold class.

      • setPlatinumExtra

        public void setPlatinumExtra(double platinumExtra)
        Set the Platinum surcharge of cinema class.
        Parameters:
        platinumExtra - Platinum surcharge of the cinema class.

      • setSeniorDiscount

      • setWeekend_HolidayExtra

        public void setWeekend_HolidayExtra(double weekend_HolidayExtra)
        Set the surcharge for weekend or holiday.
        Parameters:
        weekend_HolidayExtra - New surcharge for weekend or holiday.

      • writeSettings

        public void writeSettings(java.lang.String fileName)
        Write the settings to file. It follows the order: Base price, platinum surcharge, senior discount, children discount, weekend/holiday surcharge, gold class surchage, list of holidays. These are appended in sequence on 1 line.
        Parameters:
        fileName - File name to write the settings.
